data.convo: You ’ re free to leave . I ’ m so excited . What are you planning on doing now ? I ’ m going back to college . What are you going to major in ? I haven ’ t thought about it yet . I don ’ t want to see you back here . You won ’ t see me here again . I don ’ t think this place is for you . I know . I wish you luck . Thanks . I know things are going to be better .
